author: Naomi Li Gan
title: Instagram launches long-awaited iPad app worldwide
text:
Instagram has launched a dedicated iPad app, making it available globally on the App Store after years of only offering an iPhone-optimized version.
The app, which requires iPadOS 15.1 or later, now uses the entire iPad screen and introduces a new layout.
Users start on the Reels tab, with Stories displayed at the top, and a menu on the left for navigation.
A new Following tab offers three views: All, Friends, and Latest, with the Latest showing a reverse-chronological feed.
The app also features a split view for messages and displays comments alongside reels, rather than over them.
Instagram is owned by Meta, which had previously delayed optimized iPad versions of its apps.
